title: Decoupling of PUG approvals
description:
Description
For the PUG process the following elements are needed:
General
Approval History
Approved prices in shopping cart
Error cases and messages
a) Request incomplete or wrong
b) Creation of documents not possible when approvals missing
c) Sending of order not possible when approvals missing
The shopping cart should present the items in a structured way. Grouping the discounts might be a way to do that.
Emails to approver and requester
Adjustment for approver roles to have a unique identifier
Optional: Possibility to filter for different types of approvals
  Requester View
Displaying PUG
Prefill email address of approver from user settings
For every user a segment and region is in his profile. Derived from this information the approvers email address shall be prefilled.
The email address for the approver can be overwritten by the user in case a substitute is needed e.g. because of holidays or illnesses.
  Approver View
Approval / Rejection must be possible as well as filling in a comment
Forwarding the approval request in case of multilevel approvals
For bigger projects several PUG approvals  are needed. These follow a hierarchy for each combination of region and segment. The next approver shall be prefilled like being done for the requester from the profile information.
